title: Married Man vs. Married Woman
overview: Hyeon-goo introduces Seung-mo to the local area, probably feeling sorry for Seung-mo, who lives under his wife's nagging. However, Hyeon-goo's purpose is to divert Seung-mo's attention and meet Seung-mo's wife, So-hee. After spending time with different people, So-hee and Hyeon-goo's feelings change.
